scripts.test-all: npm run deploy-dev && npm run test
scripts.private-network-fork: npx hardhat node --fork https://mainnet.infura.io/v3/$(grep INFURA_KEY .env | cut -d '"' -f2)
scripts.deploy-rinkeby: VERIFY=true npx hardhat run deploy/runners/deployer/migrations.js --network rinkeby
scripts.deploy-chapel: VERIFY=true npx hardhat run deploy/runners/deployer/migrations.js --network chapel
scripts.deploy-eth-mainnet: VERIFY=true npx hardhat run deploy/runners/deployer/migrations.js --network eth_mainnet
scripts.deploy-bsc-mainnet: VERIFY=true npx hardhat run deploy/runners/deployer/migrations.js --network bsc_mainnet
scripts.lint-fix: npm run lint-sol-fix && npm run lint-js-fix && npm run lint-json-fix
